name: Quick Curve Ruler©
description:
The Quick Curve Ruler© comes with a free pattern called "Urban Runner".  The ruler is to be used with all  Sew Kind of Wonderful© patterns.  It is used to cut the curve shapes out and square the blocks up after piecing.   

The ruler is a quality acrylic ruler with a curve cut out, where your rotary blade of any size will fit into.  It's  7" x 12" in size and has a hang hole for storage convenience.

Materials for Urban Runner:  

~ (2) 1/4 yard assorted print *not fat quarters
~ 1/2 yard + 4" (solid background)
~ 1/3 yard for binding
~ 1 2/3 yard for backing

Quick Curve Ruler©
